data.enText: to make ideas, feelings, etc. known to sb

data.chText: 红色之类的颜色可给人以充满活力与力量的感觉。
data.enText: Colours like red convey a sense of energy and strength.

data.chText: 请向你的妻子转达我的歉意。
data.enText: Please convey my apologies to your wife.

data.chText: 他不顾一切地试图说明情况是多么紧急。
data.enText: He tried desperately to convey how urgent the situation was.

data.chText: 她不愿表现出他们人人都有错。
data.enText: She did not wish to convey that they were all at fault.
to take, carry or transport sb/sth from one place to another

data.chText: 管道把热水从锅炉输送到暖气片。
data.enText: Pipes convey hot water from the boiler to the radiators.

simple_means.memory_skill: con 共同 + vey 道路 → 共同用路 → 运输

ex.chText: 出租车把我送到了车站。
ex.enText: A taxi carried me to the station.
The monkey carried her baby on her back.

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，着重指用某一方式载运，如使用交通工具、人力、畜力、管道等，没有明确的方向性，常可与介词 from/to 连用。

ex.enText: This train conveys both goods and passengers.

ex.chText: 卡车把煤从矿场运往各个城市和村镇。
ex.enText: Trucks convey coal from mines to various cities and towns.

ex.chText: 这条管道把天然气输送到我们的城市。
ex.enText: This pipeline conveys natural gas to our city.

synonyms.bx: 多指通过自然或人工形成的线路运送人、货物或输送能源等。

ex.chText: 早晨的邮件已经送走了。
ex.enText: The morning mail has already been delivered.

ex.chText: 他们把食物送到一座偏僻的村庄。
ex.enText: They delivered food to an isolated village.

synonyms.bx: 主要指投递信件、包裹、货物等，常可与介词 to 连用。

ex.chText: 这批谷物将于下周运往日本。
ex.enText: The corn will be shipped to Japan next week.

ex.chText: 该公司是用火车还是飞机运送那批货物的?
ex.enText: Did the company ship the goods by train or by plane?

ex.chText: 我们今天把另一台机器运给你们。
ex.enText: We are shipping you another machine today.

synonyms.bx: 指用船、飞机、卡车等运货。

ex.chText: 当地人用火车运送原木。
ex.enText: The local people transport logs by train.

ex.chText: 一些货运飞机被用来把食品运往伊拉克。
ex.enText: Some airfreighters were used to transport food to Iraq.

ex.chText: 卡车把农产品运往市场。
ex.enText: Trucks transport farm products to markets.

synonyms.bx: 指通过常规交通工具长距离、大批量地运输人或物。

example: She conveyed the message to me

tr: serve as a means for expressing something
example: The painting of Mary carries motherly love
His voice carried a lot of anger

tr: go or come after and bring or take back
example: Get me those books over there, please

tr: take something or somebody with oneself somewhere
example: Bring me the box from the other room
Take these letters to the boss
This brings me to the main point

tr: transmit or serve as the medium for transmission

value.def: To convey information or feelings means to cause them to be known or understood by someone.

example.ex: When I returned home, I tried to convey the wonder of this machine to my husband...
example.tran: 回到家后，我竭力地想把这台机器的精妙之处描述给丈夫听。

example.ex: In every one of her pictures she conveys a sense of immediacy...
example.tran: 她拍的每一张照片中都传递出一种临场感，使人有如亲临现场。

example.ex: He also conveyed his views and the views of the bureaucracy.
example.tran: 他也表达了自己的看法和官方的看法。

value.def: To convey someone or something to a place means to carry or transport them there.

example.ex: The railway company extended a branch line to Brightlingsea to convey fish direct to Billingsgate.
example.tran: 铁路公司修建了一条通往布赖特灵西的支线，以便直接将鱼运送到比林斯门。

partsOfSpeech.dec: con 共同 + vey 道路 → 共同用路 → 运输
con 共同 + voy 走 → 一起走 → 护送
de 离开 + vi 道路 + ate 使… → 使偏离道路 → 越轨
de 离开 + vi 道路 + ous …的 → 离开正路的 → 误入歧途的
en 进入…之中 + voy 走 → 走进〔别人的范围〕→ 使者
ob 加强 + vi 道路 + ate 做，造成，使… → 让道路通畅 → 排除〔障碍〕
ob 加强 + vi 道路 + ous 有…性质的，关于…的 → 就在路上 → 明显的
per 贯穿 + vi 道路 + ous 有…性质的，关于…的 → 道路穿过去 → 能透过的
pre 前 + vi 道路 + ous 有…性质的，关于…的 → 前面的路 → 以前的
tri 三 + vi 道路 + al …的 → 三条路 → 分支太多 → 琐碎的
